channel.title: Abendiix | Games, tools and more!
channel.description: I'm Abendiix and I make games, tools and anything that can change the world, making it a better place for everyone.

item.title: Preview - Boto
item.description: Push and go!

item.title: Preview - Boto
item.description: Moving Mibo around the level!

item.title: Preview - Boto
item.description: Remember to relax and take care of yourselves!

item.title: Preview - Boto
item.description: Let the level shine when Mibo reaches the flag!

item.title: Preview - Boto
item.description: Check out how Boto and Mibo move around!

item.title: Preview - Boto
item.description: Boto will have to move Mibo to reach the flag and win the level!

item.title: Preview - Boto
item.description: Mibo turns gold when reaching the gear!

item.title: Preview - Boto
item.description: Boto can even dissapear from the grid! But why...

item.title: Preview - Boto
item.description: Look at all those Mibos moving!

item.title: Preview - Boto
item.description: What could this gear be for...?

item.title: Extra - Trom
item.description: TapAndHold allows anyone to play Trom with just one input!

item.title: Preview - Akompi
item.description: Neko made a new friend!!

item.title: Preview - Boto
item.description: Boto can also stretch to the top of the level!

item.title: Preview - Akompi
item.description: Poor Neko! They can't take a break with their sibling around!

item.title: Preview - Boto
item.description: Boto can move by stretching their legs to reach every part of the level!

item.title: Preview - Akompi
item.description: Hey! Where's Neko?? What are Boto and their friends doing here?

item.title: Preview - Boto
item.description: A little redesign for Boto's leaf! Just preparing them for something big...

item.title: Preview - Akompi
item.description: Neko has been thinking about something... What could it be?

item.title: Preview - Boto
item.description: I think Mibo followed Neko's advice... even robots need to rest!

item.title: Preview - Akompi
item.description: It's been a rough week! Remember to rest and take care!

item.title: Preview - Boto
item.description: You can ALSO pet the dog with Boto!! What other companions would you like to see in the game?

item.title: Preview - Akompi
item.description: Running so fast that Neko can't keep up!

item.title: Preview - Boto
item.description: You can pet the cat with Boto!!

item.title: Preview - Akompi
item.description: Three Nekos synchronized like a clock! What have they seen?

item.title: Preview - Boto
item.description: Looks like Mibo and Boto are chilling inside the grid. What are those potions and that pipe? Is that a lab?

item.title: Preview - Akompi
item.description: Oh to be an itty bitty cat that only sleeps!

item.title: Preview - Boto
item.description: This is Mibo! One of the characters that will accompany Boto in my next game!

item.title: Preview - Akompi
item.description: Looks like Neko is playing with one of their friends!

item.title: Preview - Boto
item.description: It's Boto again! But they are inside of a... grid?

item.title: Preview - Akompi
item.description: Take a look at Akompi, my new project! Akompi is both a virtual pet and companion where you can create and customize any virtual pets and companions that you want. This is Neko having some fun! A classic when it comes to virtual pets.

item.title: Preview - Boto
item.description: Say hi to Boto! The protagonist of my next game!

item.title: Release - Trom
item.description: Trom is now available! Play around with a trumpet and guess its sounds!

item.title: Release - Sprites Love
item.description: My fonts are now available and with CC0 license!

item.title: Release - Fonts
item.description: My fonts are now available and with CC0 license!

item.title: Release - Website
item.description: The website is now fully functional!

item.title: 4 symbols
item.description: In this feed, you will find 4 different types of posts. Release posts, preview posts, green posts and extra posts that will cover anything else the previous sections do not cover.
